elements.text: You are speaking to a friend over lunch. Lately, you've been processing information a bit slower than usual, and you begin to worry that your friend will think you aren't paying attention. You remember that she is aware of your diagnosis and will be...

elements.name: Slowed Response _Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
